Title: Accepting cryptocurrency with confidence today
Abstract: With blockchain technology and cryptocurrencies increasing in adoption and maturity, what key insights should companies take from these trends? And how can e-commerce and other organisations take part of this web3 centric world, incorporating virtual assets in their payment flow without any of the associated risks?

Title: Attacking Bluetooth LE design and implementation in mobile + wearables ecosystems
Abstract: Consumer IoT devices manifest in many forms, including fitness bands. We deep-dive into the wireless protocol of choice for wearables -Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE), and its impact from a security perspective. We'll perform a live demo on stealing info from a fitness tracker using standard Android app.
Slides: Conf42 Web3 2022 - Meghana Bidarahalli & Ananya M Gowda.pdf

Title: Build on Ethereum Quickly and Easily with Scaffold-ETH
Abstract: Join Kevin Jones for a session on Scaffold-ETH, an off-the-shelf stack for rapid prototyping on Ethereum, giving developers access to state-of-the-art tools to quickly learn and ship an Ethereum-based dApp.

Title: Zenroom: cryptographic VM for blockchain interop
Abstract: [Zenroom](https://zenroom.org), is a cryptographic virtual machine programmable in an English-like DSL. Zenroom performs a range of cryptographic flows (different signatures, zero knowledge proof, quantum proof crypto) and can produce a raw transaction for Ethereum and Bitcoin.

Title: Zero Trust Security with IoT
Abstract: The internet of things (IoT) covers billions of interconnected devices reachable through the internet from any location and device. Too often, “reachable” can include unauthorized entities as well as intended users.
